package.name: Techinflo_SocialMedia
package.summary: Techinflo Social Media Extension provides magento admin to integrate with facebook and twitter account and post activities on the wall.
package.description:
Social Media Extension:
Social Media Extension provides magento admin to integrate with facebook and twitter account and post activities on the wall..
This extension helps the admin to select the specific social media from the dropdown through the product general information tab as well as from the general information tab of catalog rules and shopping cart price rules, So that the admin can post on the specific activity on the wall.
The admin can share;
1. The recently added new store product. 2. Special Offers for a particular product. 3. Catalog price rule information of any special offer defined by the admin. 4. Shopping cart price rule information of any special offer defined by the admin.
